name: Burning Forest (Triggerly)
description:
You are a lost hiker, and you wake up to a forest fire. You are alone and you must try to survive. (This is a story game not a survival game). Enjoy!

A Devlog Type of video on my YouTube Channel!

Controls

W - Walk foward

S - Walk backwards

A - Walk left

D - Walk right

E - Interact

Escape Key - Unlock Cursor
